name: Zlib Compressed File
summary: Learn about .ZL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Zlib was adopted in version 1.1 of the Java Development Kit (JDK).

description: A file with .zl extension is a ZLIP compressed file format that uses a variant of DEFLATE compression algorithm for compressing files. It is independent of CPU type, operating system, file system, and character set, and hence can be used for interchange of information. Technical specifications of ZLIP compression are available on the IETF site and can be referred from developerâ€™s perspective.

File compressed by Zlib, an open source software compression library that uses the DEFLATE compression algorithm; contains a compressed file; not supported by common file compression and decompression utilities.
